nodes.text: The Howling Tempest Gang was an infamous criminal gang that was active in the Gordian Reach during the Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. The Corellian Run Scoundrels owed the Howling Tempest a large debt.
Imperial players in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan will be mistaken for the captain of the Howling Tempest Gang, while Republic players will be mistaken for the leader of the Red Hulls.
